basics.name: Samudra Palijama
basics.label: Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: Motivated fullstack developer with 6+ years of experience in developing and maintaining mobile applications using Ionic Framework, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. Specialized in cross-platform mobile development for iOS and Android platforms.

work.summary: Currently developing and maintaining company's CRM mobile applications using modern web and mobile technologies.
highlights: Developed and maintained company's CRM mobile applications using Ionic Framework and TypeScript, improving customer engagement rates
Designed and implemented new features for iOS and Android platforms, enhancing user retention through responsive UI/UX design
Researched and integrated Capacitor plugins to implement advanced device features for future mobile app functionality
Performed comprehensive manual testing with documented test cases, reducing post-release bugs
Deployed mobile applications to Google Play Store and Apple App Store, managing the entire submission and compliance process

projects.name: Mobile QR Code Generator
projects.description: Developed a mobile application using Ionic Framework that enables users to generate QR codes for text, URLs, and contact information. Built with TypeScript, the app features an intuitive interface for creating and sharing QR codes on-the-go.
highlights: Built with Ionic Framework and TypeScript
Support for saving to device gallery
Customizable colors and sizes
Cross-platform compatibility for iOS and Android

projects.name: Holy Bible / Alkitab API
projects.description: Developed a RESTful backend application using ExpressJS that fetches Bible passages and daily devotional content via web scraping with Cheerio. The API supports both English and Indonesian Bible versions.
highlights: RESTful API built with ExpressJS
Web scraping implementation with Cheerio
Search and retrieve specific verses and books
Multiple Bible translations support
Daily devotional content integration

projects.name: Logistic Delivery Mobile Apps
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive mobile application for a shipping company using Ionic and Angular. Successfully deployed to Google Play Store with core logistics functionalities.
highlights: Built with Ionic Framework and Angular
Booking creation and management system
Package tracking functionality
Booking history review feature
Secure authentication system
Integrated shipping cost calculator with dimensional weight support
Successfully deployed to Google Play Store

projects.name: Location-Based Augmented Reality Tourism App
projects.description: Bachelor's thesis project: Design and Development of Location-Based Augmented Reality Application for Tourism in Ambon City. Developed using Objective-C and iOS native frameworks.
highlights: Developed using Objective-C and iOS native frameworks
Location-based augmented reality features
Tourism application for Ambon City
Native iOS development
